scripts.check: biome ci . && astro check && npm run test
scripts.deploy:diary: npm run build:diary && wrangler pages deploy out --commit-dirty=true --project-name diary-nfurudono
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:dev && wrangler pages deploy out --commit-dirty=true --project-name dev-nfurudono
scripts.deploy:all: (wrangler whoami || wrangler login) && npm run build:diary && mv out out-diary && npm run build:dev && mv out out-dev && (wrangler pages deploy out-diary --commit-dirty=true --project-name diary-nfurudono & wrangler pages deploy out-dev --commit-dirty=true --project-name dev-nfurudono & wait) && rm -rf out-diary out-dev
scripts.fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format:write && npm run check:write
